Description: Limestone ostracon, with remains of four lines of black-painted demotic text on one side and a further thirteen lines on the reverse, the latter being more worn than the former.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Brian Muhs (Univ. of Chicago) and Amy Bahe (Cambridge Univ.). Being studied as part of PhD by Amy Bahe (Cambridge University).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393085) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393085)
